title: Quick Start Guide
description: Get up and running quickly with nosDesk
content:
# Quick Start Guide

This guide will help you get started with nosDesk in just a few minutes.

## 1. Create Your Account

If you haven't already, sign up for a nosDesk account. You'll need to provide:

- Your name
- Email address
- Company name
- Password

## 2. Set Up Your Team

Invite your team members to join nosDesk:

1. Go to **Settings > Team**
2. Click **Invite Team Member**
3. Enter their email address and select their role
4. Click **Send Invitation**

## 3. Configure Your Workflow

Set up your ticket categories and statuses:

1. Go to **Settings > Workflow**
2. Create ticket categories that match your support needs
3. Customize ticket statuses to match your process
4. Set up automation rules for ticket routing

## 4. Start Managing Tickets

You're ready to start using nosDesk!

1. Create your first ticket
2. Assign it to a team member
3. Track its progress through your workflow

## Need More Help?

Check out our detailed documentation or contact support if you have any questions.
author: System Admin
